description.fr: Lorsqu’un allié ou un adversaire meurt\_:\v Pose un {FloorMechanism:282} autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de lui.
description.en: When an ally or opponent dies:\v Places one {FloorMechanism:282} around\_<sprite name="cell_around"> them.
description.es: Cuando un aliado o un adversario muere:\v Pone un {FloorMechanism:282} a su alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
description.de: Wenn ein Verbündeter oder ein Gegner stirbt:\v Platziert ein\_{FloorMechanism:282} ringsum\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
description.pt: Quando um aliado ou adversário morre:\v Posiciona um {FloorMechanism:282} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> dele.
